title: Unknown font from library plaque - unsure of date
author: Emily_Kaye

comments.content:
Letterforms seem to match Optima, perhaps compressed a little [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/optima/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317083403/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/optima/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/optima/")
